posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Hoblitzell for your T205/T206 Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody interested?  I'm always up for a trade…if you have Sovereigns, PM me your email and I'll send you my list.  Condition doesn't matter!

Take Care,
Geno
